lead_paragraph: Charlie King, who has long had ties to Governor Cuomo, continues to rail against the party leadership.

headline.print_headline: As Cuomo’s Ally Fuels Disorder Among Senate Democrats, the Governor Stays Silent
headline.main: Andrew Cuomo Stays Silent as an Ally Fuels Disorder Among Senate Democrats

snippet: Charlie King, who has long had ties to Governor Cuomo, continues to rail against the party leadership....
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo issues no response to increasingly public pressure from State Senate Democrats to take more outspoken role in unifying party; while Democrats hold numerical advantage, eight have chosen to align themselves with Republicans, weakening party's strength in chamber; oddly heated exchanges between Democratic Sen Charlie King and party leadership heighten sense of political theater.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Independent Democratic Conference (New York State Senate)
